uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites

Class PacMan

  • java.lang.Object
    • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.Actor
      • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.PacMan

  • public class PacMan
extends Actor
    PacMan is our protagonist. He is a yellow ball with a mouth with the size of half of his body. PacMan is able to eat dots and collect items to get buffed. He is very afraid of ghosts and should avoid contact with them unless he eats a cherrylicious hunter item and becomes SuperPacMan, who is also able to eat ghosts. PacMan is also representing himself in the HUD and displays the amount of remaining lives with his own body.

      • PacMan

        public PacMan(PacManGame game,
              Assets assets,
              int initX,
              int initY,
              MapScreen screen)
        Create a new PacMan
        Parameters:
        game - The running game
        assets - The used assets-manager
        initX - Starting x-coordinate
        initY - Starting y-coordinate
        screen - The screen in which PacMan will be created

    • Method Detail

      • collide

        public void collide()
        If PacMan as a hunter collides with a ghost, he will kill it. It will cause a sound effect and increase the score. Otherwise he will be killed by the ghost, lose a life and be set to his starting position.
        Overrides:
        collide in class Actor

      • drawLife

        public void drawLife()
        Draws PacMan at the top of the screen in super-size. This method should only be called in the HUD to display the lives in a beautiful way.

      • move

        public void move()
        Moves like an Actor, but additionally collects dots and items while walking.
        Overrides:
        move in class Actor
        See Also:
        Actor

      • update

        public void update(float dt)
        Checks if PacMan is dieing right now and moves if he's not.
        Overrides:
        update in class Actor
        Parameters:
        dt - time parameter used by libGDX
        See Also:
        Actor
